Package controllers

Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
controllers.OrderController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class OrderController extends Object implements Serializable
The OrderController class is responsible for handling the order commands. MUST BE INITIALIZED BEFORE ANY USE
See Also:
